content:
Hi, can someone please update the official FH'R DevDays 2016 event location information?
On http://www.fhirdevdays.com/event-info/ it says that the event is located in Amsterdam.
(Literally, the text is: "Where Amsterdam, The Netherlands")
If you scroll down, you'll see an image come into view of the building + the venue address!

B. Amsterdam
Johan huizingalaan 763a
1066 VH Amsterdam
General: 020-2612517
